name: Dash to Plank
description:
GNOME Shell integration for Plank, the simplest dock on the planet. To use this extension, you must have Plank installed on your system.

This extension depends on Plank. To install it:
- Debian/Ubuntu: apt install plank
- Fedora/RHEL: dnf install plank
- Arch: pacman -S plank

** This extension does NOT WORK on WAYLAND.
